SELECT TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.ERROR_SEQ, a.ERROR_TYPE, a.ERROR_MESSAGE, a.ERROR_REGDATE FROM TB_ERRORHIS a WHERE 1=1
and a.ERROR_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and a.ERROR_MESSAGE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY a.ERROR_SEQ DESC ) TB LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

and a.ERROR_MESSAGE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
